casebody.data:
Bassem Sam ABDIN d/b/a The Car Company of Boone and Ramsey William Abdin, Plaintiffs
v.
CCC-BOONE, LLC and Blythe Development Co., Defendants
and
Blythe Development Co., Third-Party Plaintiff
v.
Brooks Engineering Associates, P.A., Third-Party Defendant No. 77P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Tyler R. Moffatt, Attorney at Law, Boone, for Abdin, Bassem Sam, et al. Patrick H. Flanagan, Attorney at Law, Mica Nguyen Worthy, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for CCC-Boone, LLC. Jeremy S. Foster, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, E. Lang Hunter, Attorney at Law, Jeffrey B. Kuykendal, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Blythe Development Co. W. James Johnson, Attorney at Law, for Brooks Engineering Associates, P.A.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 13th of March 2017 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
